name: Pandemia Portraits: #2 - CLAUSTROPHOBIA
description:
@MakiTorres | ig @lasmanosmorenas

After a couple of weeks of lockdown we all realized that our life will be different, probably forever.
Since I’m from Argentina but living in Chilean Patagonia, I understood that visiting my loved ones back home will be unlikely and take several month.
My new life was small, because my apartment was small too, and I discovered myself with fear of the future for the first time.  
In this portrait you can see a big hand, totally out of proportion, tryin to support and hold deep feelings of distress and desolation, alongside with emotional claustrophobic. 
Despite of the clear background, the shadows landed on the face of the portrait and, for sure, on her/his mind. There is no bright side, only a terrified look of the future. 
First experience with watercolor and ink. Some improvements were made on photoshop.
